variations.name: SALT
variations.detail: Light and healthy, perfect for when you're looking for something simple to nibble on. The slight saltiness adds a savory touch.

variations.name: CHILI
variations.detail: Spicy and satisfying, great for when you're craving a bit of heat but want to keep it light. Ideal for sharing.

items.name: VIETNAMESE SPRING ROLLS
items.detail: Crispy on the outside with a fresh, light filling. Great as a starter or snack, with a sweet and tangy chili dip that enhances the flavor.

items.name: KOREAN FRIED CHICKEN
items.detail: Crispy, savory, and with a satisfying crunch. The pickled mooli adds a refreshing balance to the richness of the chicken. Ideal for those with a hearty appetite.

items.name: PRAWN TOAST
items.detail: Crunchy and packed with flavor. The sweet chili dip adds a kick that pairs perfectly with the sesame-coated prawn toast. Great for sharing or as a treat for yourself.

items.name: AVOCADO MAKI
items.description: CUCUMBER, AVOCADO, BALSMIC PEARL, CREAM CHEESE
items.detail: Creamy avocado with the crunch of cucumber. Perfect for a light, refreshing bite, with a hint of richness from the cream cheese.

items.name: CALIFORNIA
items.detail: A classic sushi roll with delicate king crab and creamy avocado. The light touch of mayonnaise adds a richness, making it ideal for when you want something indulgent yet refreshing.

items.name: ASIAN CORN SALAD
items.description: MIZUNA LEAVES, GRILLED CORN, MISO DRESSING
items.detail: A mix of smoky grilled corn and tangy miso dressing. Light but flavorful, perfect for a refreshing side dish or a light meal.

items.name: KING CRAB SALAD
items.description: KUMQUAT, FENNEL, ENDIVE, BROWN CRAB MAYO
items.detail: The sweet, citrusy kumquat pairs perfectly with the rich, delicate king crab. This salad is light yet indulgent, making it a great option for a special treat.

items.name: DASHI MARINATED TOMATO
items.detail: The tangy tomatoes and creamy burrata create a delightful balance of flavors. Perfect for a refreshing and flavorful light meal or as an appetizer.

items.name: MARGARITA Y BURRATA
items.detail: A classic flatbread with a rich tomato base and creamy burrata cheese. Ideal for when you're craving something simple yet delicious.

items.name: PEPPERONI
items.description: PEPPERONI, TANGY TOMATO, MOZZARELLA, CHILI OIL
items.detail: Savory pepperoni with a spicy kick from the chili oil. Perfect for when you're in the mood for something hearty and flavorful.

items.name: THAI CHILI CHICKEN
items.detail: A fusion of sweet, spicy, and tangy flavors with a unique texture from the toasted coconut and peanut. Great for adventurous eaters or those seeking bold flavors.
